description: From Middle English by-sprenkled, be-spryngeld, besprengild, equivalent to be- (“on, about, around, upon, all over”) +‎ sprinkled.

adjectives.description: besprinkled (comparative more besprinkled, superlative most besprinkled)

examples: […]  the multitude were in no bad humour at being now and then besprinkled with friendly showers of momentary duration  […]
